text: الا انهم هم المفسدون ولكن لا يشعرون

translations.translation: Yet they are surely mischief-mongers, even though they do not know.
Beware! they do spread disorder but they realize it not.
They, certainly, are corrupt but do not realize it.
Pay heed! It is they who are mischievous, but they do not have sense.
Verily, they are the ones who make mischief, but they perceive not.
Now surely they themselves are the mischief makers, but they do not perceive.
Truly, they are the workers of corruption but they are not aware.
Are not they indeed the mischief-makers? But they perceive not.
but it is they who are really causing corruption, though they do not realize it.
Lo! verily it is they who are the corrupters, and yet they perceive not.
Behold! They are themselves the agents of corruption, but they are not aware.
Of a surety, they are the ones who make mischief, but they realise (it) not.
Verily! They are the ones who make mischief, but they perceive not.
But it is they who are the evildoers, though they do not sense it.
In fact, they are the troublemakers, but they are not aware.
Unquestionably, it is they who are the corrupters, but they perceive [it] not.
[2:12] Truly (a-lā, ‘truly’, is for alerting), intended emphatically, they are the agents of corruption, but they perceive, this, not.
(They are indeed the mischief mongers) by being a hindrance. (But they perceive not): the followers do not know that their leaders mislead them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { أَلاۤ } أيها المؤمنون الموقنون بكتاب الله المصدقون لرسوله { إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْسِدُونَ } المقصرون على الفساد، لا يرجى صلاحهم أصلاً؛ لكونهم مجبولين على الفساد { وَلَـٰكِن لاَّ يَشْعُرُونَ } [البقرة: 12] بمشاعرهم لغشاوة قلوبهم وأبصارهم وأسماعهم
